DOC.brief_summary: Watching football match could cause increase blood pressure heart rate induce catecholamine thus increase incidence cardiovascular event . However , study evaluate response blood pressure heart rate soccer spectator . This study evaluate hemodynamic response Brazilian soccer fan suffer coronary artery disease dispute game favorite team .
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Effects Soccer Match Viewers With With Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: Coronary artery disease ; Avai Figueirense ( brazilian soccer team ) fan Acute coronary syndrome le 7 day
